local_intent: Detect the green bottle, open gripper, approach and align to it within 0.01 m tolerance, then verify target remains visible.
assumptions: Bottle is reachable and visible; gripper is operational; clear approach path exists.
coherence_with_global: Covers the perceive and approach stages of GLOBAL_BT with identical parameters: DetectObject -> OpenGripper -> ApproachAndAlign. Adds a bounded retry on detection per failure-and-recovery guidance and verifies visibility after alignment.
